Name: T?JUMPLOSS
Data: You should have looked before you leaped.
In the movies, your life would be passing before your eyes.

Name: T?WHEEEEE
Data: Very good. Now you can go to the second grade.
Do you expect me to applaud?

Name: T?SWIMYUKS
Data: You can't swim in the dungeon.

Name: T?HELLOS
Data: Nice weather we've been having lately.

Name: T?CYCLOMAD
Data: The cyclops appears to be getting more agitated.
The cyclops is moving about the room, looking for something.

The cyclops was looking for salt and pepper. No doubt they are
condiments for his upcoming snack.
The cyclops is moving toward you in an unfriendly manner.
You have two choices: 1. Leave  2. Become dinner.

Name: T?LAMP-TABLE
Data: The lamp appears a bit dimmer.
The lamp is definitely dimmer now.

Name: T?CANDLE-TABLE
Data: The candles are becoming quite short.
The candles won't last long now.

Name: T?BDIGS
Data: You seem to be digging a hole here.
The hole is getting deeper, but that's about it.
You are surrounded by a wall of sand on all sides.

You dodge as the thief comes in low.
